=== Postgres ===

==== psql commands ====

Command line

{{{
$ psql
  -c    # Execute a command
  -l    # List databases
  -h    # Host
  -d    # Database name
  -U    # Username
  -W    # Password
}}}

<br />

Console

{{{
> \?    # Help
> \l    # List databases
> \c    # Connect to a database
> \dt   # List tables
> \du   # List roles
> \d    # List tables, views, sequences (\dS+)
> \d Name   # Describe table, views, sequences (\dS+)
}}}
